      • checkRestrictedCryptography

        public static boolean checkRestrictedCryptography()
        Determines if cryptography restrictions apply. Restrictions apply if the value of Cipher.getMaxAllowedKeyLength(String) returns a value smaller than Integer.MAX_VALUE if there are any restrictions according to the JavaDoc of the method. This method is used with the transform "AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding" as this is an often used algorithm that is an implementation requirement for Java SE.
        Returns:
        true if restrictions apply, false otherwise https://stackoverflow.com/posts/33849265/edit, author Maarten Bodewes
